item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Herman Melville
item.description: "It is not down on any map; true places never are." -- Herman Melville

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Yvon Chouinard
item.description: "The more you know, the less you need." -- Yvon Chouinard

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Warren Buffett
item.description: "Honesty is a very expensive gift, Don't expect it from cheap people." -- Warren Buffett

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Jon Krakauer
item.description: "So many people live within unhappy circumstances and yet will not take the initiative to change their situation because they are conditioned to a life of security, conformity, and conservatism, all of which may appear to give one peace of mind, but in reality nothing is more dangerous to the adventurous spirit within a man than a secure future. The very basic core of a man’s living spirit is his passion for adventure. The joy of life comes from our encounters with new experiences, and hence there is no greater joy than to have an endlessly changing horizon, for each day to have a new and different sun." -- Jon Krakauer

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Malcolm Gladwell
item.description: "Practice isn't the thing you do once you're good. It's the thing you do that makes you good." -- Malcolm Gladwell

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Ibn Battuta
item.description: "Traveling- it leaves you speechless, then turns you into a storyteller"- Ibn Battuta" -- Ibn Battuta

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Muhammad Ali
item.description: "If my mind can conceive it, and my heart can believe it - then I can achieve it." -- Muhammad Ali

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Yvon Chouinard
item.description: "Real adventure is defined best as a journey from which you may not come back alive, and certainly not as the same person." -- Yvon Chouinard

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Ed Viesturs
item.description: "Getting to the top is optional. Getting down is mandatory." -- Ed Viesturs

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Nassim Nicholas Taleb
item.description: "It has been more profitable for us to bind together in the wrong direction than to be alone in the right one." -- Nassim Nicholas Taleb

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by John le Carré
item.description: "You could be the perfect spy. All you need is a cause." -- John le Carré

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by John le Carré
item.description: "He was learning to live on several planes at once. The art of it was to forget everything except the ground you stood on and the face you spoke from at that moment." -- John le Carré

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Thor Heyerdahl
item.description: "Borders I have never seen one. But I have heard they exist in the minds of some people." -- Thor Heyerdahl

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by John le Carré
item.description: "She's become a Russian again, he thought. When something works, she's grateful. When it doesn't work, it's life." -- John le Carré

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by John le Carré
Jonathan add a quote by John le Carré
item.description: "... in moments of crisis our thoughts do not run consecutively but rather sweep over us in waves or intuition and experience ..." -- John le Carré

item.title: Jonathan add a quote by Frances Hodgson Burnett
item.description: "At first people refuse to believe that a strange new thing can be done, then they begin to hope it can be done, then they see it can be done--then it is done and all the world wonders why it was not done centuries ago." -- Frances Hodgson Burnett
